nodes.text: The IR-16 System Management Droid was a model of droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. An IR-16 System Management Droid oversaw the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

An IR-16 System Management Droid appears as an enemy in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
